valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 2 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 3 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 981 losing its identity by midday tomorrow. Atlantic low expected 200 miles west of Rockall 964 by same time
